EmailTemplate.description: Knowledge Article Submitted for Review - Custom
EmailTemplate.name: 8A. Knowledge Article Submitted for Review
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Review this Knowledge Article
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Knowledge Manager,
There is a new knowledge article ready for you to review.
Please review the article and edit as needed. Once complete, please either approve or reject the article.
Link to article: {!Knowledge__kav.Link}
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
